sqlMap.select: SELECT SIDO || ' ' || GUGUN || ' ' || DONG || ' ' || DONG2 AS ADDR, BUNSISTA, BUNSIEND, ZIPCOD FROM gcweb.ZIPCOD WHERE SIDO LIKE '%' || #sido# || '%' AND GUGUN LIKE '%' || #gugun# || '%' AND DONG LIKE '%' || #dong# || '%'
SELECT DISTINCT SIDO || ' ' || GUGUN || ' ' || DONG AS DONG FROM gcweb.ZIPCOD WHERE DONG LIKE '%' || #dongNm# || '%' OR DONG2 LIKE '%' || #dongNm# || '%'
